message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hello Alice, thanks for offering this product! I'm interested but that price is a little high for my budget. Would you consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can see if I can do a bit better, but I'm not willing to go as low as $70. How about $160?
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice.  To be honest, $100 is the absolute most I can do.  Would that work for you?
I'm not willing to sell it to you for $100, Bob. That's below my minimum price. I can see you're really interested, so I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $140?
